mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(CAST(SCHEDULE_ID AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1 FROM schedule

/*Schedule.selectListEvent 스케쥴 이벤트 목록을 조회한다. */ SELECT SCHEDULE_ID , DATE_FORMAT(EVENT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS EVENT_DATE , EVENT_START_TIME , EVENT_END_TIME , PATIENT_NAME , TREAT_DVS_CODE , (SELECT inspection_name FROM medicalcharge b WHERE b.inspection_Code = a.treat_dvs_code ) "TREAT_DVS_NAME" , SIMPLE_MSG_CTNT , EVENT_STATUS , EXAM_USR_NM , PRESCRIBER_USR_NM , DELETE_YN , SCHEDULE_BATCH_CREATE_YN , CREATE_DT , CREATE_USR_ID , UPDATE_DT , UPDATE_USR_ID FROM schedule a WHERE EVENT_DATE BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
